name: Wynford Hotel

reviews.text: We paid £110 a night for this place. I am not a regular of the four-season but I expected a lot more for my hard earned money!!!
reviews.title: stay away

reviews.text: It was nothing like the photos on their website. What a grotty, dated place. I have truly stayed in better backpackers. The rooms were dusty, with evidence of sick stains on the carpets. I lifted the phone in my room and found my hand covered in back dust. You will not sleep before 3 am due to the nightclub under your floorboards!
reviews.title: Ok for the price

reviews.text: All that said, the breakfast in the morning was a welcome surprise, even if I felt like I was an extra in phoenix nights!
reviews.title: Fab weekend!
Warm and Friendly
reviews.text: Well, you get what you pay for I guess. Basic accommodation in a great location. Helpful and courteous staff made up for slightly shabby rooms which if near the club are noisy.

We stayed here for the weekend whilst on my future sister in-laws Hen Party. We were greeted and looked after through out our stay by the friendly staff. The rooms were very good for the price which we paid. We were joined by other Hen and Stag parties and we joined in at the club, which yes is loud if your above it but when on a weekend like ours was fine. This was a fantstic place to stay for such an event or for a weekend break in Cardiff for parties etc but maybe not really a good place for a quiet break, but the service etc would more than compansate. Keep it up.
reviews.title: Excellent Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Standards of cleanliness not brilliant. There was dust and 'bits' behind the headboard. The shower over the bath could not be used. The bathroom was cold with no visible form of heating.
reviews.title: Not brilliant

reviews.text: Having said that, the sheets were clean, the breakfast was good and there was parking.
reviews.title: Give It A Miss!!

description: The Wynford Hotel is very conveniently located within a few minutes walk of the city centre and all its facilities. Located on Clare Street which is one of the main arterial roads in and out of the city. This is a 40 bedroomed hotel with a range of different room styles. We have a residents bar open everyday from 10.00am until 5.00am the next day (residents only). As well as breakfast we offer a range of freshly prepared bar meals every evening. At weekends the hotel becomes the place for party people and a warm welcome is extended to Stag & Hen groups as well as everyone else. A word of warning though, if you are looking for a quiet weekend away then this is not the place for you. Throughout the week the hotel offers an excellent base for tourists and business travellers alike, with the City centre on our doorstep. With a range of recently refurbished rooms with Plasma TVs, a good standard of accommodation is offered with the benefit of free wireless internet.
